name: 3rd Workshop on Road Traffic Monitoring
tagline: Master in Computer Vision Barcelona (4 February 2016)
body: This workshop includes the final project presentation in the Module 4 "Video Analysis" of the [Master in Computer Vision Barcelona](http://pagines.uab.cat/mcv/). This module is organized by the [Image Processing Group](https://imatge.upc.edu/web/) at the Universitat Politecnica de Catalunya. Each team has set up a project page where you can access their final report, slides, as well as all source code used during the module. | Team ID | Project page | Paper | Slides | | :------: | :------------:|:------:|:------:| | 1 | [URL][url-1] | [PDF][pdf-1] | [Gdoc][slides-1] | | 2 | [URL][url-2] | [PDF][pdf-2] | [Gdoc][slides-2] | | 3 | [URL][url-3] | [PDF][pdf-3] | [Gdoc][slides-3] | | 4 | [URL][url-4] | [PDF][pdf-4] | [Gdoc][slides-4] | | 5 | [URL][url-5] | -
